chapter.title: Settings Overview
chapter.para: To view or modify global settings for your appliance, hover over the Configure menu and click the sub-tab for the setting to modify. The availability of each sub-tab depends on the role assigned to your user account. For more information on roles, see .
The following is a list of the sub-tabs available from the Configure menu:

listitem.para: My Settings is available to all CloudForms Management Engine users. Its settings control the visual aspects of the console, time profiles, and tags used by the individual user.
Configuration is used to specify enterprise, region, zone, and server settings for the CloudForms Management Engine infrastructure. Diagnostics including logs and process status is also shown here.
About provides session information and links to CloudForms Management Engine documentation as well as the Red Hat Customer Portal.
